ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: your Lord is always lying in wait.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Your Lord is certainly in wait.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Truly your Lord is ever watchful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: your Lord keeps an eye on (all evil-doing people).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed nothing is hidden from the sight of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, your Lord is Ever Watchful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely your Lord is watching.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: surely thy Lord is ever on the watch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thy Lord is ever watchful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: for, indeed, your Sustainer is ever on the watch!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily thy Lord is in an ambuscade,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed your Lord is in ambush.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For thy Lord is (as a Guardian) on a watch-tower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, your Lord is Ever Watchful (over them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: indeed, your Lord is ever watchful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your Lord is on the lookout.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:14] Assuredly your Lord is ever on the watch, watching over the deeds of servants, nothing of which escapes Him, that He may then requite them for these [deeds].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thy Lord) Muhammad (is ever watchful) He says: they, as well as all created beings, will have to go through Him; it is also said that this means: the angels of your Lord will be on the Bridge over hell stopping people at seven different stopping positions at which they will ask them about seven traits.
